scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix trip-planner"
scripts.start: node --optimize_for_size --max_old_space_size=460 & concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix trip-planner"
